speech.value: What a great conversation with Sal Khan. So, you know, kind of a – there were so many great aspects of that. I mean, I think kind of at the beginning, and you talked about this with him, but just the fact that – and you’ve talked about this with other people over the years that we’ve done this podcast, too – but as you said, kind of the importance of having that one person in your life who can kind of help unlock or put an idea in your head of maybe what’s possible or what you can do, I think that can be so powerful. And I think that’s especially powerful when we think about education. Do you want to talk more about that?
